pre-footer.heading:
PLEASE JOIN US TO EXPERIENCE
THIS GREAT MOVE OF GOD
pre-footer.paragraph:
House of Worship is a place where yielding, submitting, surrendering, loving, obeying and serving God is our main priority
AND
Winning, succeeding, healing, deliverance, overcoming, conquering and prospering is our portion.

services.heading: Church Weekly Programs
services.content:
Sunday Service:
Sundays from 10:00AM - 1:00PM

Prayer Warriors:
Mondays from 6:00PM - 7:30PM

Bible Study:
Tuesdays from 6:00PM - 7:30PM

Mid-Week Service:
Wednesdays from 6:00PM - 7:30PM

Prayer Meeting:
Fridays from 6:00PM - 7:30PM

events.description: I’m an event description. To edit the event description go to My Events. Simply click Manage Events and start editing your event details. I’m a great place to get your guests excited by telling them a little more about your upcoming events.
